amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to allow State health exchanges to go forward where there have been applications for early innovator grants and would exempt from the defunding, $1.9 billion, and make it subject to the appropriations process.
amendment.purpose: A substitute amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-70 to preserve funding for establishment of Health Benefit Exchanges for states that apply for early innovator grants before 2012. The funds used shall be subject to availability of appropriations up to $1.9 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Welch.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Welch.
